title: Understanding SQL Query Structure
text: In SQL, the order of clauses is crucial for the query to execute correctly. Each clause has a specific role in the query execution process.

title: The Role of GROUP BY
text: The GROUP BY clause is used to arrange identical data into groups. It is often used with aggregate functions like COUNT, SUM, AVG, etc.

title: Order of SQL Clauses
text: Consider the logical flow of data retrieval: selecting columns, specifying tables, filtering rows, grouping results, and finally ordering them.
